timeline.bodyText:
This test could be merged with EvaluationResultTest. Instead of test the concrete implementation StaticExpression, it would test the ExpressionLanguage / EvaluationResult API.
IMO: I would prefer an API test over the StaticExpression test because the logic in StaticExpression is not complicated and it does not guarantee that the API behaves the same (e.g. if the class is used differently or not used at all).
timeline.author: saig0

timeline.message: feat(broker): Enable FEEL expressions for job retries
